name: ELECTRIC BIRD
description:
A dark royal blue crelly filled with pink/gold flakes, iridescent violet micro hex, and scattered micro holo sparkle. More swatches here, at the Moonstone Nail Polish Facebook page.


PRODUCT DETAILS

 

• Full sized 12ml nail polish

• Wide brush for easy application

• 2 stainless steel ball bearings

• 3-Free formula (no Toluene, Formaldehyde or DBP)

• Solvent resistant glitter

• High quality suspension base

• Vegan & cruelty free

 

ADDITIONAL INFORMATION

• Moonstone nail polishes are made from high quality suspension base and tinters, cosmetic grade pigments, and solvent resistant glitter.

• Although we use high quality suspension lacquer base, some glitters may settle over time. To fix this, simply shake the bottle gently or turn it upside down 10-15 minutes before use.

• Moonstone Nail Polish is mixed by hand and as a result, slight variations between batches may occur.

• We endeavour to represent the colour of each nail polish as accurately as possible with the photos in each listing. However, due to different monitor settings and resolutions, colours may appear slightly different to the actual colour of the polish.

• Store in a cool place. Keep away from heat, flame, and sunlight.

• Keep out of reach of children


 

PRODUCT APPLICATION & REMOVAL

• Always use a base coat to prevent staining

• Wait a few minutes between coats, allowing each coat to dry

• Moonstone nail polish can be built up on its own using 3-4 coats or you can use it over a base colour that is similar to the Moonstone nail polish you are using.

• Some glitter-heavy polishes may dry to a ‘rough’ finish. Simply add a clear topcoat to fix this.

• Glitter nail polish is notorious for its difficulty to remove. I recommend using either a PVA base coat or the ‘foil method’ (Click here a great tutorial from Elissa aka @tenlittlenubs)

 

SHIPPING

Click here for shipping information. Shipping within Australia ONLY.
